description: "Text on this map notes that Sumatra is divided into two equal parts by the Equator, so that the days and nights are always the same length. It also notes that Java is ruled by the Dutch, though the Mataram Sultanate in central Java is also mentioned."
label: "Carte d'une partie de la Chine, les Isles Philippines, de la Sonde, Moluques, de Papoesi, &c / dressee sur les relations les plus nouvelles ; I. Condet s."
